metadata.name: Glint of Gold
metadata.description:
This is the first edition in an ongoing series which over time will hopefully be widely shared with the community. The goal with this project is to spread love and positivity to those who need it and to those who've been a ray of light to others even in the darkest of times. 

The first edition is gifted to those who have made a positive impact in my life and future editions will hopefully be a ripple effect of this gesture as we continue to pay it forward.
